enum.name: if_facer_opmode_t
enum.comment: This determines the current status of skill execution.
enum.item: Facer will not process any images
Facer will detect faces, but not try to recognize them.
Facer will detect faces, and then try to recognize the most dominant face.
Facer will gather images and learn an identity.

data.comment: The interface provides access to the face recognition plugin (facer). It provides basic status information about facer and allows for setting a specific mode and access the resolut. calling skills via messages. It can also be used to manually restart the Lua interpreter if something is wedged.
data.field: True if opmode is learning and learning has been completed, false otherwise
Time in seconds since the last successful detection.

message.name: LearnFace
message.comment: Sets opmode to OPMODE_LEARNING and will assume the given label for the face.
